ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] ask about running multiple jobs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heritrix can only run jobs in series.  To run multiple concurrent jobs, instantiate multiple instances of Heritrix. ... You too, St.Ack

yzhang_il wrote:
> Hi,
>
> I'm a little confused about this problem. Every time I created several
> jobs, and then I let heritrix start crawling, but it seemed that only
> one job could be run at one time, and all the others were pending.
> However as I know, Wget could run a group of jobs at the same time. Is
> it a way I could run several jobs together in heritrix? Thanks a lot!

Heritrix can only run jobs in series.  To run multiple concurrent jobs, 
instantiate multiple instances of Heritrix.
>
> Have a nice day!

You too,
St.Ack
